      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      class  MeatSource 
      Methods in thiefworld.agents that return FoodSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FoodSource Observer.getBestFoodSourceWithinRange(ThiefWorld world, java.lang.Class<?> foodSourceType)
      Searches for the food source with the highest quantity of food within range
      FoodSource Observer.getClosestFoodSourceWithinRange(ThiefWorld world, java.lang.Class<?> foodSourceType)
      Check to see if there is a close by food source and if there are multiple, it will choose the closest to the current agent's position.
      Methods in thiefworld.agents with parameters of type FoodSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ActiveAgent.examineFoodSource(ThiefWorld world, FoodSource foodSource)
      Examines a food source and gathers the maximum allowed amount.
      protected void ActiveAgent.extractFood(FoodSource foodSource)
      Extracts the maximum amount of food from a specified FoodSource.
      protected void ActiveAgent.moveTowardsFoodSource(ThiefWorld world, FoodSource foodSource)
      Moves in the direction of a food source.
